text: Bajčići () is a village in the island of Krk, in the Primorje-Gorski Kotar County, Croatia. Mate Bajčić Gašpović, who was from here, was the last speaker of the Istro-Romanian language in Krk. He died in 1875. == Population == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: 0.5em auto; text-align: center;" |- ! colspan="16" | Population number according to the census |- | 1857 || 1869 || 1880 || 1890 || 1900 || 1910 || 1921 || 1931 || 1948 || 1953 || 1961 || 1971 || 1981 || 1991 || 2001 || 2011 |- | 133 || 146 || 153 || 144 || 150 || 158 || 155 || 161 || 180 || 168 || 131 || 112 || 100 || 114 || 127 || 131 |- |} == References == Category:Populated places in Primorje-Gorski Kotar County Category:Krk
title: Bajčići
